event.title: Event
event.description: Settings that control what events trigger various commands.

buildOnSave.title: Build after Save
buildOnSave.description: Automatically run build after files are saved.

openAfterBuild.title: Open after Build
openAfterBuild.description: Automatically open targets after build is completed.

openAfterChangeCursonPosition.title: Open after the cursor has changed its position. If the opener supports sync and open in background then this setting will keep the position in the opener constantly syncronized with the editor.
openAfterChangeCursonPosition.description: Automatically open targets after build is completed.

$PATH.title: Search Path
$PATH.description: Additional directories needed for finding TeX or viewers. Use `$PATH` to include system search path. Paths should be separated by `:` on Linux/MacOS and ';' on Windows.

outputDirectory.title: Output Directory
outputDirectory.description: All files generated during a build will be redirected here. Leave blank if you want the build output to be stored in the same directory as the TeX document.

dviToPdfEngine.title: DVI to PDF Engine
dviToPdfEngine.description: Program to use when post-processing DVI output in order to produce PDF. This is only used for LaTeX engines not capable of natively producing PDF.

intermediatePostScript.title: Generate Intermediate PostScript
intermediatePostScript.description: Enable generation of PostScript using dvips when the output format is pdf. This is only used for LaTeX engines not capable of natively producing PDF

copyTargetsToRoot.title: Copy Targets to Root Directory
copyTargetsToRoot.description: Ensures that the output files produced by a successful build is stored together with the TeX document that produced it.

cleanPatterns.title: Clean Patterns
cleanPatterns.description: The files and directories to remove during a clean.

open.description: Settings that determine which opener to use.
open.title: Open

pdfViewSplitDirection.title: pdf-view Split Direction
pdfViewSplitDirection.description: Pane split direction to use for pdf-view.
